website_summaries.verdict: These bungee cords are for people who have a heavy duty job and need to know the product is secure.
pros: Bungees come with carabiner clips as hooks
Clip style helps make sure the cord will not slip
Thicker and stronger than many other cords
Cords hook together well and have a nice amount of stretch
cons: All 6 of the bungees in this set are the same 60" length

customer_reviews.title: Nice clip concept but weak and cheaply made cord.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the clips on these bunji cords and they worked good for about a month and already 2 of them snapped and just in time for me not to beable to return them. Good clip concept, weak cords though. You wont get much use out of them. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are strong and they work
customer_reviews.text: They are strong and they work. We have very heavy winds around the Chicago area and our patio furniture covers take a beating and fly off even though they are attached to the furniture. We put four of them together to go round the outside of the table and six chairs plus another two to go around the two side chairs and a small table and so far everything has stayed in place. So much better than last year. I like that the hooks close and stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: These bungees ARE NOT to be trusted in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: These bungees ARE NOT useful in the sun. These bungees came apart after less than three weeks in the sun wrapped around a motor cycle cover . Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: EdwardsMall

customer_reviews.title: Bungees fit for a Jedi.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty these bungees are. Held strong and firm my shelter it did. Two sets I now own I do. May the Swartz be with you.
customer_reviews.author: J. HallTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and not very good
customer_reviews.text: The clips aren't high quality and don't align or lock. Wanted to return them, but I'd be out $8 shipping, so we'll try and use them for something. Definitely don't buy this for a dog leash extender, it's not safe. Also, has STRONG chemical odor. I'd get something else if I could have done it over again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Used one time - broke
customer_reviews.text: Took these on a float trip to tie tubes together. Spring broke within 10 minutes of our journey. Does not seem sturdy or reliable, nor would I expect it would be able to sustain heavy loads.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Strus

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: These bungee's hold well, and clip easily. The clips themselves are lightweight, so made out of inferior metals compared to real climbing equipment, but they more than suffice for the tasks at hand with a bungee.They stretch to about 1/3rd of the resting rate, so don't over stretch them, which is easy to do with this length.
customer_reviews.author: L. McNerneyTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: WORST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: The connectors on the ends are not sturdy they bust and pop off the cord.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly annette

customer_reviews.title: Love these greatly!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered to use on vacation to beach. Wrapped around: an all terrain wagon (heavily modified), lg chairs, 3 beach umbrellas, lg ice chest, 2 lg beach bags... worked better than expected. The hinges to 'clip' them in broke on half of them... doesn't matter. Just put pulling tension on it and hook them over something/anything and they stayed anyway. Never even mattered. Keeping & using these forever. Very tough & look great even after abuse for a solid week.
customer_reviews.author: C. Docken

customer_reviews.title: Good bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: I have an old Weider Crossbow. It’s a workout machine with fiberglass bows. Over the years, the bows have lost some of their tension and, I needed more resistance. I used these to add that extra tension. I wrapped them around the hooks that hold the bows and hooked then to the cross member. Now, I can get a great workout with added tension. I really should post a good picture but, I don’t have the time right now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Ended up loosening after a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: I used this to tie down a tarp onto a canopy via the canopy holes and tarp rivets. At first it was great, very stretchy but taut at the same time. However after being exposed to the elements aka recent heatwave the bungees have all loosened up! I ended up having to tie it down with regular rope instead. So these definitely are weather proof, or maybe it was the elastic itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Storage cover
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect fit for my boat storage cover. These are designed well and should last for years. Decent price too.
customer_reviews.author: lakeman

customer_reviews.title: One giant leap for humankind
customer_reviews.text: I clipped them to my pants and skateboarded off the garage roof and into the pool. The experiment worked. My neighbor, observing this spectacle, ran over and said, “What are you doing... committing bungiecide?” I said, “No, you silly goose. I’m conducting important research.” Don't try this at home. I am a scientist.
customer_reviews.author: Andy G

customer_reviews.title: WOW, BUNGEE CORDS 60 INCHES (5 FEET) LONG AND TOUGH!
customer_reviews.text: Received these Bungee Cords on time! Thanks Amazon! These Bungee cords are black, long and tough! I looked all over the place for extra long bungee cords and couldn't find any at a REASONABLE PRICE! So I bought these. I have a floor to ceiling shelving unit for storage in my garage and these are going straight across the front. These bungee cords will hold storage supplies in place in case of an earthquake! Not only that, these bungee cords will be used for a hundred other uses, such as holding down tarps on our pull trailer. THIS IS A GREAT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy McCallister

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: He actually said I ordered something he liked. We were shutting down the pool for the season and he used these to put in the grommets in the cover and hooked them to the deck instead of puttting a bunch of screws into our deck this year. Had a few left over and he said he’d find a good use for them. That made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Utt

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bungee ripped right out of the yellow plastic piece on all 6 bungee cords the 1st time we used it. Carabiners are not sturdy at all. One tug and they bend and break. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not for Outside Use!!!
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought these were great, fantastic actually, but after half of a season outside they disintegrate. I had them on my boat cover (pictured) over the winter and I thought a rodent ate them so I got more. (because, like I said before, I thought they were great). This time one can clearly see the UV-rays from the sun disintegrates them after about 3 months. Once the yellow outside fabric is faded and gone the rubber inside goes very fast. Only purchase for indoor use. A 1 star is harsh but they say these are UV treated.
customer_reviews.author: Online in Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap On The Hook
customer_reviews.text: We just put these on our deck furniture and they are pretty much all broken. The metal piece that bends back is PLASTIC and it has no purpose as it is broken. We have very strong winds and had to use broken as we tied them together. SORRY BUT TRUTH.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O'Malley Milott

customer_reviews.title: Best bungee cords I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: These bungie's rock! I use them to hold down the pool noodles to my car. Then strap surfboards on top of the noodles.
customer_reviews.author: AMZ-HNC

customer_reviews.title: SMELLY but STRONG
customer_reviews.text: These are great. really strong and sturdy. you get a big ol' whiff of some stinky fishy stuff when you open the jar. I'm guessing that's the material its made from. stink fish. jk. actually some plastics and rubber materials have chemicals in them that emit a fish like or urine like smell and that's probably it. It in no way hinders the ability of the product, i just wouldn't use them to tie anything down where you'd smell it quite often or it may leach into something you use regularly.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Finks

customer_reviews.title: Great product - highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. we use for holding the chairs around our patio table. All are covered, but these hold everything together and covered even in storms with high winds. Great product. As described. Highly recommend this product and this seller. Very pleases.
customer_reviews.author: Dave in Rancho Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor long-term use
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bungee with carabiner to secure my grill cover (without it, the cover blows off in storms which defeats the purpose) and it needs to last through New England winters. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Domenico Bettinelli

customer_reviews.title: Fastening part is plastic.
customer_reviews.text: These babies are little pillows of air. Feel good. BUT not sure yet how long they last because the part that the screw goes through is plastic also, no metal. But you get a lot for the money.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality - Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be very high quality,stretch out well and hook together very nicely! Using to keep some patio furniture covered during the winter months and look to be the perfect product that I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Carmody

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, got the wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: Product may be a little expensive for what they are, we'll see how well they hold up over time. Also I ordered Black and received yellow, sadly I needed to use them almost immediately as I purchased for a specific product so I didn't get to exchange them for the proper color.
customer_reviews.author: P. McC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, long lasting and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product and affordable. Most bungee cords I buy are cheap and dont last. These have been holding up my shade blinds at an angle for months.
customer_reviews.author: OneofaKindBulldogs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: In using these to hold in place, covers for my patio furniture. They are easy to use, sturdy and so far, no rust.
customer_reviews.author: quilt lover

customer_reviews.title: Stands by their product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I like the closed loop ends. I'm really pleased with the customer experience. I had a problem with one of the bungee cords and emailed their support team. They got back to me almost instantly asking where they could send a replacement cord. It arrived within days.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent J Kenkel

customer_reviews.title: NOT UV Stable.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted about 4 months outside in the sun. The yellow cover disintegrated. Don't use where it will get extended sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L

customer_reviews.title: I used these to tie down my patio furniture,  perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I used them but they appear to be very strong and sturdy and just what I was looking for and for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Heretick

customer_reviews.title: Need quality - here it is!
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality cords and appear to have a good longevity factor. The carabiners are an excellent idea makes working in difficult places so much easier. Company stands behind its product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: daily shopper

customer_reviews.title: Super bungee.
customer_reviews.text: Great bungee cord. It might be me but i seem to be dissastisfied with the carabieners on products?
customer_reviews.author: Danvl

customer_reviews.title: Good stretch, well made.
customer_reviews.text: The amount of strong stretch is very good. I have others that have very short stretch length. The cord and fittings are well made and well attached
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband wanted for securing cargo in his truck
customer_reviews.author: Jplpyl

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a Second Set!
customer_reviews.text: This are strong and clip easily. I liked them so much to hold the tarps down on my firewood, that I ordered a second batch to wrap around my citrus blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Mookie Nu

customer_reviews.title: Suggest not to use in direct sun
customer_reviews.text: Great product used it too to hold down wood pile cover lasted one season
customer_reviews.author: Gary Doelle

customer_reviews.title: Great flexible  length !!
customer_reviews.text: Use allowed a flexible connection between my Bird Feeder and its anchor points in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: Great Concept
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, though one set began to fray after the first use. I spoke with the vendor who said this is common. It hasn't affected the strength so far. Overall happy with the purchase and very happy with the courteous and helpful vendor.
customer_reviews.author: art4ever

customer_reviews.title: I used it to hold down logs, wood, ...
customer_reviews.text: I used it to hold down logs, wood, an 8 meter roll of tent and SS stakes, did some offroading, had very rough trip on some harsh terrain and everything was intact. I think what I just said deserves a 6 Star review. It is also the optimum length.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein A.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Nice long length. I keep them in the truck to help with securing cargo.
customer_reviews.author: MomNana

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Bungee Cords
customer_reviews.text: Super High Quality - Great Length 2nd Reorder of same: I bought another set as out of the 100s of bungees I have bought - these are flat out "THE BEST" what else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Long Time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these to wrap around tarps on a dog ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to wrap around tarps on a dog kennel. They keep the tarps from flapping! Why didn't I get these at the beginning of winter?
customer_reviews.author: J. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic. I ordered two sets to secure stuff on garage shelves against earthquakes. They are well make with high quality plastic end fittings with metal carabiners. I like them so much I ordered a third set. They are a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne.

customer_reviews.title: Strapright Bungee Cord with Carabiners 60" long.
customer_reviews.text: The carabiners are strong and close tight, thick cord and seems strong and long lasting. We use these cords in our truck beds to secure gas cans and our lawn equipment, we are very pleased with these bungee cords.
customer_reviews.author: Fran S. Key

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s black and it’s a bungee with carabiners. If that’s what you want, order it. If not, don’t. It’s not much more complicated than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ray V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Made of quality material it seems. Order was delivered in a timely manner
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS B.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These only lasted about 3 months before they frayed or snapped. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended with Attitude
customer_reviews.text: This is the, "Hulk", of bungie cords, going to trust these far more than the ones I am replacing at the present. You can feel how well made they are.
customer_reviews.author: JIMM Arney

customer_reviews.title: tough!
customer_reviews.text: these hold downs have held up exceptionally well. use them every day to hold down lumber, debris, tools and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S.

customer_reviews.title: seemed to work well. I'll know more when the ...
customer_reviews.text: seemed to work well. I'll know more when the pod is delivered to my new home if they held the 1000 plus mile journey from Chicago to Maine.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzbea

customer_reviews.title: These are ok, but...
customer_reviews.text: Bungee cord seems to be of high quality but the carabiners are not that great
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, exactly right for the job!
customer_reviews.text: I’m using them to secure my grill and deck furniture from blowing around over the winter. Quality product... exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Leiter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to attach a bungee cord!
customer_reviews.text: I like the reliability of attaching the cord with a carabiner---much less likely to become disengaged or bumped loose. It is also easier to attach to some places where a regular hooked end doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M.

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: Love these bungee cords. So far they are holding up to the desert sun just fine.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very strong, well made, will last. I would like shorter versions of the same if they made them. These are long.
customer_reviews.author: Saucy

customer_reviews.title: Good price, but sketchy quality
customer_reviews.text: Good price, but sketchy quality. Right out of the box, two of the six had obvious defects. I pulled on the caribiners to see if they were solid, and they made a lot of popping sounds and didn't give me confidence in the build. I'll use these, but I won't trust them much.
customer_reviews.author: RooftopShawn

customer_reviews.title: I love the longer lengths of these bungee cords and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the longer lengths of these bungee cords and the carabiners! So far the bungee cords have held up great with light everyday use. They stretch very well!
customer_reviews.author: Schloops

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: These are the best. Had never seen bungees with carabiners. Great idea
customer_reviews.author: geneva

customer_reviews.title: so good. Time will tell how they hold up since ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Time will tell how they hold up since I will be using them over the winter to hold down a tarp.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again . . .
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. They've been in use for a couple weeks and they are much better than anticipated! Very flexible and secure. worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Charm

customer_reviews.title: Not strong
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong. several broke will a bit of torque applied. Used them to hold a small kids raft on my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well made. We need these for our move to new house. Nice size
customer_reviews.author: Mtmeme

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & reliable 60” bungees with carabiners
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It was difficult to locate long bungees-delighted with this product.Prompt service. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and
customer_reviews.text: The new standard for bungees! Carabiners provide a secure attachment. Great quality and value
customer_reviews.author: Big Kahuna

customer_reviews.title: The best. Why didn't I get these sooner - carabiners ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, fast shipping. The best. Why didn't I get these sooner - carabiners on bungees.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: These cords saved all the pool furniture and kayaks at our condo, while Irma came through. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth yerkes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what my husband needed to tie down patio furniture covers
customer_reviews.author: charlotte aylor-diaz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and Quality,
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality and exactly what i needed in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Abrisard

customer_reviews.title: Untrustworthy
customer_reviews.text: Do not trust these under any kind of load. This one separated when a 35 lb dog pulled in it when it was brand new.
customer_reviews.author: K. Steger

customer_reviews.title: It is good to have much longer Bungee cords to tied down ...
customer_reviews.text: It is good to have much longer Bungee cords to tied down light loads in trailer or back of a truck.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Tudela Maanao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A strong and nice clip, going to buy more, holding down the tarp on a 12 x 12 gazebo, working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: D DOUBLED

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: One of the carabiners broke (the spring) after the first use. Nice idea, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mine

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Bought them to tie down stuff in our trailer. Used them in many different ways on our inaugural trip with new trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Bungee cords with carabiners
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty, very strong and I love the carabiners on each end! They're great for many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Devera Denker

customer_reviews.title: connectors
customer_reviews.text: The carabiner connectors are much better than the ordinary run of the mill wire hooks.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: the bungee attached to the hook did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: tried to secure from rowboat to dock separated too easily after leaving tied for 1 week
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used 2 1/2 months outside on my beehive, already breaking down and 1 hook broke. Will not buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Cords lasted less than 6 months. All the external layer disintegrated

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Preparing for winter snow, used bungees (carabiners) to hold the tarps in place.

customer_reviews.title: It broke the first day
customer_reviews.text: It is not durable at all and broke the first day.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but does not stretch as much as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Great length, carabiner ends are nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice bungee cord, I did order the black ones, but received the yellow ones instead.
customer_reviews.author: VICKI L GARDNER

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor furniture covers.
customer_reviews.text: We use the bungy cords to hold down our outdoor chair covers. They work great and are so easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: TMc

customer_reviews.title: I just love these bungee cords
customer_reviews.text: I just love these bungee cords. Used them again today to secure a large table in my truck bed. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Drove from Delaware to Michigan. Theses cords held down a net I had purchased and it worked wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Allyn

customer_reviews.title: These 60in Bungee Cords were the perfect answer.
customer_reviews.text: Towing my 24ft boat on vacation from Florida to Tennessee, wanted some extra protection to keep the boat cover on while at highway speeds. These 60in Bungee Cords were the perfect answer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Like these!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for securing covers on outdoor furniture, used alone or coupled together. Like the carabiner closing.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Bad carabiners
customer_reviews.text: This deserves about 2.5 stars. The reason it lost 2.5 stars is that the carabiner on the end doesn't have anything to prevent it from being pulled out. With barely any use on these the caribiner on two of these started to lose it's closed shape. These would be vastly improved by having a latch where the spring loaded part locks into it's corresponding position on the "C" part. But this isn't the case (it just inserts into a groove with nothing holding it from pulling out). This is a flawed design.
customer_reviews.author: Szu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cords worked great to go across the hot tub to keep the cover from blowing up.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These seem really well made and stretchable with nice end clips.
customer_reviews.author: Edwardo

customer_reviews.title: strong
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for securing a room in a school in case of an emergency-they are great and strong, and we hope we do not need them!
customer_reviews.author: D. Tiller

customer_reviews.title: The built-in contoured plastic handle for the carabiner is probably its best feature as it makes it easy to hook things ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job really well, especially when all I needed is a quick tie-down for loose items during transport. The built-in contoured plastic handle for the carabiner is probably its best feature as it makes it easy to hook things in place and doesn’t easily slip from one’s fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Palileo

customer_reviews.title: but I am sure that they will work out just fine.
customer_reviews.text: Have not had occasion to use them yet, but I am sure that they will work out just fine.

customer_reviews.title: So far, So good!
customer_reviews.text: Due to strong wind, we had constant problems with the wind blowing our classic accessories patio furniture covers off our outdoor furniture. I wrapped these around the bottom and no problems since. They have survived the summer with no ill effects, durability will be tested in the winter.

customer_reviews.title: Great to use
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this for bungee tables chairs on out side of deck
customer_reviews.author: joshua lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Clips are very good and good flexibility. Good for reason of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Hernandez

product_meta.title: Bungee Cord with Carabiners Super Long 60" | 6 Pack UV Treated with Superior Latex Core which Lasts Longer than Flat Bungees | Strong Wide Mouth Hook Locks onto Anchor Points with Ease (Black)
feature_bullets: EXTRA LENGTH CORDS: There is nothing worse than the bungeesnot reaching!Our 60” long bungee tiedowns stretch further to secure large and lengthy cargo loads.
PREMIUM LATEX CORE: Our heavyweight bungee cords are stronger & last longer than rubber core tie downs. These bungee straps also have a UV treated exterior for a lengthy life.
MOLDED CARABINER: Carabiner clips at both ends of the bungee ensureyou can lock onto the anchor point, and the carabiner hook won’t bend, break or slip off.
CONVENIENT 6 PACK: Our multi-pack contains 6 heavy duty bungee cords – always have enough strong straps to tie down a tarp, tent or trailer canopy in safety.
STRAPRIGHT GUARANTEE: We stand by our heavy duty carabiner bungees and guarantee their performance 100% or we will refund your money.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars353 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
